message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $120 for this exceptional product. This offer allows you to acquire it at a reasonable premium compared to market rates while securing a deal that reflects its true value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions about the product.
